root.name: Growlanser
root.description: OverviewGrowlanser is the first installment in the long running real-time strategy RPG series by Career Soft. The game was published by Atlus for the PlayStation in 1999 and an enhanced port was released for the PlayStation Portable in 2009, which included new characters and story paths as well as other improvements.

similar_games.game: Akatsuki no Amaneka to Aoi Kyojin: Pashiate Bunmei Kenkyuukai Koubouki
